ROOT.GetData: select uptime,yuntime,path from same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaAppNameysh_cloud_image where yuntime>={0} and yuntime<={1};
ROOT.UpdateYun: delete from same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaAppNameysh_cloud_image where path={2}; insert into same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaAppNameysh_cloud_image (uptime,yuntime,path) values ({0},{1},{2})
